[Function] clear-cache

Package

ystok.uri

Signature

clear-cache uri =>

Arguments
uri
An instance of the uri structure class.
Values

None.

Description

The function must be called after invoking any slot setter (setf uri-slot) explicitly. It invalidates the slots that contain the internal string and parsed path representations.

See also
  • uri [Structure Type]
